item.title: Additional frauds; email sent to McDonald’s General Counsel CCed to McDonald’s CEO
item.description: DE: [Nom de la victime/témoin-clé/lanceur d’alerte, masqué pour conserver l’anonymat] (Visitez le site X-v-France.com pour plus d’informations) TO : Gloria.Santona@us.mcd.com CC : Steve.Easterbrook@us.mcd.com SUBJECT: additional frauds Ms Santona, Thank you for answering me. Could you please make sure the French team communicate with me by email? Normal mail takes forever for me to receive now that I live in China and I am not going to wait one month to act if there is an ongoing fraud.
